scripts.db:setup: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:create-user && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:setup:prod: npm run db:migrate:prod && npm run db:create-user:prod && npm run db:seed:prod
scripts.db:create-user: npx wrangler d1 execute todo --local --command="INSERT INTO users (name, email, password, updated_at) VALUES ('shefat', 'myphoto288@gmail.com', '11221122', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);"
scripts.db:create-user:prod: npx wrangler d1 execute todo --remote --command="INSERT INTO users (name, email, password, updated_at) VALUES ('shefat', 'myphoto288@gmail.com', '11221122', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);"
scripts.db:tables: npx wrangler d1 execute todo --local --command="SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table' ORDER BY name;"
scripts.db:tables:prod: npx wrangler d1 execute todo --remote --command="SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table' ORDER BY name;"
